configSource.title: DeltaLake Configuration Source
configSource.description: Available sources to fetch the metadata.

metastoreHostPort.title: Hive Metastore Service
metastoreHostPort.description: Thrift connection to the metastore service. E.g., localhost:9083

metastoreDb.title: Hive Metastore Database
metastoreDb.description: JDBC connection to the metastore database. E.g., jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/demo_hive

username.title: Connection UserName
username.description: Username to use against metastore database. The value will be mapped as spark.hadoop.javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName sparks property.

password.title: Connection Password
password.description: Password to use against metastore database. The value will be mapped as spark.hadoop.javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword sparks property.

driverName.title: Connection Driver Name
driverName.description: Driver class name for JDBC metastore. The value will be mapped as spark.hadoop.javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName sparks property. E.g., org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver

jdbcDriverClassPath.title: JDBC Driver Class Path
jdbcDriverClassPath.description: Class path to JDBC driver required for JDBC connection. The value will be mapped as spark.driver.extraClassPath sparks property.

metastoreFilePath.title: Hive Metastore File Path
metastoreFilePath.description: Local path for the local file with metastore data. E.g., /tmp/metastore.db

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: Metastore connection configuration, depending on your metastore type.

oneOf.title: S3Config
oneOf.description: DataLake S3 bucket will ingest metadata of files in bucket

profileName.title: Profile Name
profileName.description: The name of a profile to use with the boto session.

assumeRoleArn.title: Role Arn for Assume Role
assumeRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume. Required Field in case of Assume Role

assumeRoleSessionName.title: Role Session Name for Assume Role
assumeRoleSessionName.description: An identifier for the assumed role session. Use the role session name to uniquely identify a session when the same role is assumed by different principals or for different reasons. Required Field in case of Assume Role

assumeRoleSourceIdentity.title: Source Identity for Assume Role
assumeRoleSourceIdentity.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume. Optional Field in case of Assume Role

bucketName.title: Bucket Name
bucketName.description: Bucket Name of the data source.

databaseName.title: Database Name
databaseName.description: Optional name to give to the database in OpenMetadata. If left blank, we will use default as the database name.

connectionArguments.title: Connection Arguments
connectionArguments.description: If using Metastore, Key-Value pairs that will be used to add configs to the SparkSession.

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

includes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and include only database entities that match.

excludes.description: List of strings/regex patterns to match and exclude only database entities that match.
